the basic increase instructions 36 single_crochet leave a 30 cm 12 in tail for attaching and fasten_off calypso the kooky owl - by sharon maher of laughing purple goldfish designs ©2013 4 basic increase instructions start use the appropriate yarn to make an amr round 1 chain 1 6 single_crochet into ring tighten tail 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each st 12 single_crochet round 3 * 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet repeat from * around 18 single_crochet round 4 * 2 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 24 single_crochet round 5 * 2 single_crochet in next st 3 single_crochet repeat from * around 30 single_crochet round 6 * 2 single_crochet in next st 4 single_crochet repeat from * around 36 single_crochet round 7 * 2 single_crochet in next st 5 single_crochet repeat from * around 42 single_crochet assembly turn the sample owl has been turned inside out so that the back of the stitches are showing if you would like the same effect now is the time to do this attach eyes lay the owl down flat with the finishing tail at the top right corner position the eyes at the centre of the face the eyes on the sample owl are placed face down so that the back of the stitches are showing the left eye should sit 2 row down from the top of the head the right eye should sit 4 row down from the top of the head stitch eyes in place using back stitch and the long tails left for this purpose embroider add simple embroidery detail using c3 teal work a running stitch around 2/3 of the left eye make long stitch eyelashes on the right eye add buttons position the buttons toward the inner edges of the eyes use yellow embroidery thread to secure them in place beak cut a beak shape from thick felt position between the eyes on a slight angle stitch in place using yellow embroidery thread add a small amount of fabric glue if needed to secure the rest of the beak stuff stuff the owl approximately 2/3 full with polyfill seam use whipstitch to seam across the top of the head with the long tail left for this purpose prepare tassels cut 16 x 25 cm 10 in lengths of c1 eggplant yarn attach tassels use 8 lengths of yarn for each side thread the yarn through each corner at the top of the head tie in a double knot to secure
